business.pricing: Desktop valuations start at $95 per item; onsite work billed hourly.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Los Angeles provides professional antique appraisal services in the Los Angeles area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Sarah J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Linda T.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Karen T.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Emily M.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Heritage Valuations Los Angeles's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.
